0.user_question: Henry had 3 action figures, but needed 8 total for a complete collection. If each one costs $6, how much money would he need to finish his collection?

ost_step.1: Identify the number of action figures Henry currently has. He has 3 action figures.
ost_step.2: Identify the number of action figures Henry wants in total. He wants 8 action figures.
ost_step.3: Calculate the difference between the number of action figures he wants and the number he currently has. Henry needs 8 action figures - 3 action figures = 5 more action figures.
ost_step.4: Multiply the cost of one action figure by the number of action figures Henry still needs to buy. Each action figure costs $6. So, he needs to spend $6 * 5 = $30 to finish his collection.
